XNUT-100 & XNUT-105 DIN-rail SBC
[Configuration]

DIN-rail mounted Single Board Computer in enclosure with 2 x RS-232, 2 x RS-485, 1 x RS-422 interfaces (software configurable), CAN port (XNUT-105) and 10-30 V (24 V) switch mode power supply. The XNUT-100 and XNUT-105 modules have been specifically designed for industrial communication tasks such as Monitoring & Controlling serial devices, gathering sensor data, Gateway Applications and Protocol Conversion. More...

Collaboration diagram for XNUT-100 & XNUT-105 DIN-rail SBC:


Modules

 LED Control Macros
 Functions to drive the XNUT status LED S1 (LED3) and S2 (LED4).
 UART Control Macros
 Functions to control UART modes.

Detailed Description

DIN-rail mounted Single Board Computer in enclosure with 2 x RS-232, 2 x RS-485, 1 x RS-422 interfaces (software configurable), CAN port (XNUT-105) and 10-30 V (24 V) switch mode power supply. The XNUT-100 and XNUT-105 modules have been specifically designed for industrial communication tasks such as Monitoring & Controlling serial devices, gathering sensor data, Gateway Applications and Protocol Conversion.
